name: Road Trip To The Axis Of Evil
description:
Demilitarized Zone (DMZ) tour
OK, you can’t actually wander around in North Korea, but a trip to the DMZ is just a couple of hours away.
Visitors to an observatory, one of North Korea’s infiltration tunnels, a military base.
 
After DMZ tour we will take you to Paju premium outlet, the second luxury premium outlet introduced in Korea.
Futhuremore, you will visit Paju Provence Village
